so for lunch we're here at the mall at a food 
court which by the way is a very good place

to be if you want to have real authentic Thai 
food experience don't think of Thai food courts

as you know the American food court it's really 
much better so I'm having today potty mouth and

party now is drunken nodos it's a very popular 
dish and I have a video for that but today I'm

having it with spaghetti noodles it's called the 
packet beep a Teemo very simple and it's actually

a very common thing for people to do it's it's 
probably one of the more popular fusion food

my brother who is holding the camera is having 
common guy or Hainanese chicken rice I have a

video for that so you can go and check that out 
and right here is blood cooked flood which is

usually served with the chicken I didn't do that 
on my video but you know it's pretty standard and

for beverages I'm having Chama now or Thai iced 
tea with lime and I talked about this as being

one of my favorite drinks and I have a video 
of how to make this and it truly is very very

refreshing and my brother on the other hand is 
having something not refreshing but creamy and

sweet it is that's hi iced coffee and of course 
I have a video for that as well so here we go

it's really quite a different experience from the 
regular Pat came out his regular hat somehow it's

done with the big flat rice noodles so it's 
not you know it's chewy and just the flavors

different so when it's spaghetti it's almost not 
the same dish at all even though the holy basil

and the spiciness of the garlic and the chilies 
is still there so I highly recommend if you want

to give this a try I have a recipe to sub well 
cook spaghetti noodles for something a little

different so we just bought some desserts which 
is like shaved ice and you can choose whatever

you want under it and now we're gonna go eat 
it so just now you saw I dipped the spoon in

the hot water that they had prepared for it and 
that's you know the sanitizing system so people

are afraid that the spoons are dirty you can 
take care of it and so the standard thing is

you know they've got a bunch of different things 
and you choose whatever you want and then you can

choose to syrup or you can choose this red 
syrup which is kind of like grenadine with

a different flavor or you can choose a coconut 
syrup so I chose bread which I know it looks

weird but it's really good soggy bread mmm and 
this stuff top team crop or you know literally

translated to crunchy Ruby so it's water chestnut 
inside with tapioca bouncy things on the outside

they've got Saturday which is a kind of new 
dough so it's the same as glass noodles or

version of it and then I got this other stuff

called rural myth which is just a whole mess 
of different things this one is particularly
